scripts.set_env_vars_for_development: node set_env_vars localhost root '' mouj http://localhost:80/mouj/api/requests.php
scripts.build: npm run set_env_vars_for_production && rm -rf ./mouj-project && parcel build ./src/index.html --public-url ./ --dist-dir ./mouj-project && cp -r ./api ./mouj-project && node ./after_build_script.js
